dc_description_s: This point shapefile contains the locations of infant cemeteries in China from 1644 to 1796. This layer was created as part of the Grave Reform in Modern China project, a digital humanities initiative based at Stanford that is building an interactive spatial and textual analysis platform to examine the phenomenon of grave relocation in modern China.
dc_publisher_s: Stanford University. Center for Interdisciplinary Research
